short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Samvidha ERP Software Fast Printing Plug - In. To Use this client must have to Install "Samvidha Printing Driver"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Samvidha ERP Software Fast Printing Plug - In. To Use this client must have to Install "Samvidha Printing Driver" from samvidha.online

This application is only used for Samvidha ERP Users.
